cycle of 20 minutes is suggested regardless of whether the items are wrapped or unwrapped. 
Aft er 20 minutes remove the autoclave from the heat source, open the pressure valve to 
release the steam and allow it to cool for 15â€“30 minutes before opening it. 
Dry heat sterilisation (electric oven)
When available, dry heat is a practical way to sterilise needles and other instruments.
